dmca.title: Reguarding Mp3stor.com - illegal activity.
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2007 4:26 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3337893F] Reguarding Mp3stor.com - illegal
activity.

MIME element (text/plain) 
Hello The Planet, 
 
Http://www.mp3stor.com has gotten ahold of my band's CD, 
and is distributing our songs without our permission. 
 
View the evidence : 
 
http://www.mp3stor.com/albums/76/20325/65824/larry_his_flask/were_going_
dancin_tonight/ 
 
 
Please have this looked after, 
I am taking it to you before I persue any legal action. 
 
Thankyou, 
Glen 
LAHF Help and Management.
